headline: Procter & Gamble (PG): A Fresh Look at Valuation Following Pantene’s New Clinical Hair Care Launch
summary: Procter & Gamble (PG) has unveiled a new Pantene hair care system designed to target hair loss and strengthen scalp health. The system is backed by clinical research supporting its efficacy. This launch is sparking fresh interest among investors. See our latest analysis for Procter & Gamble. P&G’s rollout of the new Pantene system comes as the company continues to navigate a challenging stretch. The latest share price closed at $146.98 and the one-year total shareholder return is at -14.95%...

headline: National Advertising Division Finds Certain Blueland TikTok Shop Influencer Disclosures Appropriate; Blueland Voluntarily Modifies or Discontinues Others

headline: P&G to Webcast Presentation From the Morgan Stanley Global Consumer & Retail Conference, December 2
summary: CINCINNATI, November 25, 2025--Andre Schulten, Chief Financial Officer of The Procter & Gamble Company (NYSE:PG) will be a featured speaker at the Morgan Stanley Global Consumer & Retail Conference on Tuesday, December 2, 2025 at 8:45 A.M. Eastern Time (ET).
